mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS r FROM ( SELECT BOARD.*, MEMBER.nickname, MEMBER.grade, TOPIC.topic_name FROM BOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD.member_no = MEMBER.member_no left OUTER JOIN TOPIC ON BOARD.topic_no = TOPIC.topic_no WHERE BOARD.cat_no = 1 ORDER BY b_no DESC ) A, (SELECT @rownum := 0) R ) B WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS r FROM ( SELECT BOARD.*, MEMBER.nickname, TOPIC.topic_name FROM BOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD.member_no = MEMBER.member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN TOPIC ON BOARD.topic_no = TOPIC.topic_no WHERE BOARD.cat_no = 1 AND BOARD.topic_no = #{topicNo} ORDER BY b_no DESC) A, (SELECT @rownum := 0) R ) B WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CAT_NO = 1;
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE cat_no = 1 and b_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (b_no, b_title, b_content, b_write_date, b_view, b_reply, b_recommend, member_no, cat_no, topic_no) VALUES ((SELECT * FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(b_no),0) + 1 AS max_b_no FROM BOARD) AS tmp), #{b_title}, #{b_content}, current_timestamp, 0 , 0 , 0 , #{member_no} , 1 , #{topic_no})
mapper.select: SELECT topic_no FROM TOPIC WHERE topic_name = #{topic_name}

SELECT BOARD.b_no, BOARD.b_title, BOARD.b_content, BOARD.b_view, MEMBER.nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE b_no = BOARD.b_no) AS reply_count FROM BOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD.member_no = MEMBER.member_no WHERE BOARD.b_no = #{b_no};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE cat_no = 1 AND topic_no = #{topicNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_VIEW = B_VIEW + 1 WHERE b_no = #{b_no}
